result.execSummary:
This case is being appealed. If the court makes a decision in a case that a party disagrees with, the party may have the right to seek review by a higher court to determine if the trial court's decision was correct. Appeals are most often made after a trial or final decision in a case, but an appeal can also occur before a final decision.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes and ADA: Edward Minser DF ATTY: Brian Thomas Smestad and DF ATTY: Christopher Bub DF:  Cristian Daniel Nunez appeared from jail. Court interpreter's M. Marin and M. Evans-de Carpio. Case called at 8:19 outside the presence of the jury. Court reads jury questions. ADA Nieskes responds to the questions. ADA Minser responds. Atty. Smestad responds. Atty. Smestad address question regarding texts. Court addresses question #1 jury is instructed to rely on their recollection. Court addresses question #2 and will send back pages 1-5 only of Ex. #159.  Court will show jury the shoe in exhibit and pictures of the camo shoes. Court reporter will read back the portions of the texts. Recess at 8:37. Case recalled at 9:19 in the presence of the jury. Court reporter reads back those portions of text messages to the jury. Investigator Koehler shows the the both pair of shoes to the jury. Recess at 9:32 to continue deliberations. Case recalled at 10:10 with a verdict. DE asked to stand. Court reads verdicts.
Verdict 1- 
Guilty of Taking and Driving a Vehicle Without the Owner's Consent in violation of 943.23(2).
Verdict 4-
Guilty of Unauthorized Possession of an Individual's Personal Identifying Documents in violation of 943.201(2)(a)
Verdict 6-
Guilty of First Degree Intentional Homicide as to Courtney Bradford, contrary to 940.01(1)(a).
Verdict 8-
Guilty of First Degree Intentional Homicide as to Jasmine Bradford, contrary to 940.01(1)(a).
Verdict 10-
Guilty of Arson of a Building, contrary to 943.02(1)(a)

 Atty. Smestad requests polling of the jury. 

State moves for judgment on verdicts and requests a PSI. Court enters a judgment of conviction on all verdicts. Court will revoke bail and remand DE. Court orders a PSI. Atty. Smestad responds to request of PSI and informs the court he will advise his client of his 5th amendment right.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes  and ADA: Edward Minser.  DF ATTY: Brian Thomas Smestad and DF ATTY: Christopher Bub DF:  Cristian Daniel Nunez appeared from jail. M. Marin and M. Evand-de Carpio Court Interpreters. JURY TRIAL DAY 6. Case called at 8:24 outsife the presence of the jury. Case called at 8:29 in the presence of the jury. Court reminds Investigator V. Koehler she is still under oath. Continued direct of Investigator Koehler by ADA Minser. Ex. #199. Ex. #300 O/R. Cross by Atty. Smestad. Ex. #215 . Redirect by ADA Minser. Ex. #301. Ex. #302, #303, #304 O/R. Recross by Atty. Smestad. S. Demulling retakes the stand and is reminded by the court he is still under oath. Direct by ADA Minser. Cross by Atty. Smestad. Redirect by ADA Minser. Recross by Atty. Smestad. Recess at 9:35. Outside the presence of the jury court reviews exhibits rec'd. Atty. Smestad makes a motion for dismissal. ADA requests the Court to deny the motion. Recess at 9:55. Case called at 10:07. ADA Nieskes updates the corrections on count 2. ADA Nieskes moves to amend the pleadings to conform to the proof. Atty. Smestad responds. ADA Nieskes responds. Court requests clarification. Court authorizes amendment. Case recalled at 10:14 in the presence of the jury. State rests. S/T J. Knutson Investigator with the River Falls PD. Direct by Atty. Smestad. Juror question at 10:22. Court answers juror question. S/T D. Trost. Direct by Atty. Bub. Cross by ADA Nieskes. S/T A. Westmorland. Direct by Atty. Smestad Ex. #216, 21 , 218 O/R.
